title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Military Targets in Southern Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Ongoing Conflict”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings and terror infrastructure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.

Combat aircraft attacked a short while ago, terrorist infrastructures of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Al-Hiyam and Rab Al-Tlaten areas in southern Lebanon. In addition, the IDF attacked with artillery in the Hula area to remove threats.

Last night combat aircraft attacked a military building of the organization in the Al-Jibin area.

In the last few hours, rockets were launched from Lebanese territory that crossed into the Margaliot and Malkia areas, the IDF attacked the fire sources. As a result of the shootings, an IDF soldier was slightly injured and was evacuated to receive medical treatment in a hospital, his family was updated.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3PKZPbv
